greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest prime p such that |p - R(p)| = 9n, where R(n) is digit reversal of n, A004086; or 0 if no such prime exists.
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 12 2002
ext: Corrected and extended by _Sascha Kurz_, Jan 02 2003
